name: A.I. Gone Wild
description:
DISCLAIMER: The game might not work properly in some computers. The jumping height might be too high or too low or the game's speed will be changed drastically from what was intended. And because it's an old project that I did not have a backup with the development files, I am not able to fix it.

A man that has been in a coma for 18 months fell victim to some scientists that are conducting tests with his consciousness trapped in a virtual reality environment. Ultimately, they try to wake him up by implanting an A.I. in his brain, but the situation quickly gets out of control and the man has to delete the A.I. that became corrupted and is trying to take over his body.

You can read more about the project here
